for ANC, including the fi rst 
visit/registration. It should be emphasised that this is only a minimum requirement and 
that more visits may be necessary, depending on the woman's condition and needs. 
/circle6 Suggested schedule for antenatal visits
/lozenge6 1st visit:  Within 12 weeks—preferably as soon as pregnancy is suspected—for 
registration of pregnancy and fi rst antenatal check-up
/lozenge6 2nd visit: Between 14 and 26 weeks
/lozenge6 3rd visit: Between 28 and 34 weeks  
/lozenge6 4t
